@AgainstSugarTax I agree with that. Soft drinks should be a lot more expensive than milk
@AgainstSugarTax it would be easier to avoid sugar if the cost was a factor
@AgainstSugarTax a bit like climate change- I don't think we have the luxury of time to keep stalling. There's enough evidence to start on
@AgainstSugarTax and why do you think a sugar tax won't work when a tobacco tax certainly has - in NZ at any rate
@AgainstSugarTax so what's your solution?
@AgainstSugarTax but you are UK based, I doubt soft drink sales are falling in NZ
@AgainstSugarTax is this the industry speaking?
